mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_exam_subject(title, option_a, option_b, option_c, option_d, answer, parse, title_type, paper_id) VALUES (#{subject.title}, #{subject.optionA}, #{subject.optionB}, #{subject.optionC}, #{subject.optionD}, #{subject.answer}, #{subject.parse}, #{subject.titleType}, #{subject.paperId})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_exam_subject SET title = #{subject.title}, option_a = #{subject.optionA}, option_b = #{subject.optionB}, option_c = #{subject.optionC}, option_d = #{subject.optionD}, answer = #{subject.answer}, parse = #{subject.parse}, title_type = #{subject.titleType}, paper_id = #{subject.paperId} WHERE id = #{subject.id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.option_a, a.option_b, a.option_c, a.option_d, a.answer, a.parse, a.title_type, a.paper_id, a.create_time, b.paper_name "paper.paperName" FROM t_exam_subject a, t_exam_paper b where a.paper_id = b.id ORDER BY a.id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT id, title, option_a, option_b, option_c, option_d, answer, parse, title_type, paper_id FROM t_exam_subject WHERE paper_id = #{paperId} AND title_type = #{titleType}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_exam_subject where title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{title}), '%')

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.option_a, a.option_b, a.option_c, a.option_d, a.answer, a.parse, a.title_type, a.paper_id, a.create_time, b.paper_name "paper.paperName" FROM t_exam_subject a, t_exam_paper b where title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{title}), '%') AND a.paper_id = b.id ORDER BY a.id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
